snippet.title: Microsoft Flight Simulator X Trailer HD
snippet.description:
With Microsoft Flight Simulator coming up on its 25th year as a franchise, it's amazing that a series with no guns or missiles has proved to be so long lived and popular.

 Then again, there's a reason why Flight Simulator is so durable, as this comprehensive flight simulation lets wannabe and real-life pilots alike take to the skies in a variety of aircraft, ranging from helicopters to light aircraft to jumbo jets.

 Flight Simulator is one of the few games that is practically an industry unto itself, as there are countless third-party add-ons (both commercial and free) that add scenery, planes, and much more.

-Gamespot-
